name: wooziness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the feeling of being weak or ill and unable to think clearly: I still suffer occasional wooziness from the altitude. In severe cases, dizziness, faintness, wooziness, or even loss of consciousness can occur. See
woozy
More examplesFewer examplesA balance disorder may cause feelings of giddiness or wooziness.She could no longer stand the pain, the wooziness, the exhaustion.The sides from western Europe who play in Kazakhstan will probably blame wooziness for results that go against them.
